segments.text: How about going to dance this evening , Jane ? You will find that the night life of this city is very interesting !
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Good idea . There is a good nightclub nearby , isn't it ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yes , the dance hall is nice with various styles of music .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: ( In the club ) Look at those people in the dance floor , they are so crazy .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: That's rock and roll with fast tempo .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I like the slow dance . I am good at rumba and waltz .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Take it easy . The time for slow dance is the middle part of the party .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Let's find a quiet seat and sit down for beverage .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Listen , it is waltz . I like the elegant step of the old styles .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: ( When they are dancing ) You dance gracefully !
segments.speaker: S1
